meanings.definition: Inhabitants of the opposite side of the world.
meanings.sent1: The antipodeans live on the other side of the globe.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about the antipodeans who reside far away.
meanings.sent3: The antipodeans must have a different view of the stars at night.
meanings.sent4: Their culture seems like a mystery to us, like the antipodeans are from another planet.
meanings.sent5: The idea of antipodeans makes the world feel vast and diverse.

meanings.definition: People from Australia and New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: My friend is planning a trip to visit the antipodeans in Australia.
meanings.sent2: Antipodeans are known for their friendly nature and beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the antipodeans have kangaroos as pets.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the antipodeans is as strong as the roots of ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The accents of antipodeans add a unique charm to their speech.
